section.heading: Management Supervisory Service skills maintenance and enhancement.
section.text: Management Supervisory Service employees shall be required to maintain and enhance their management and supervisory skills.

annotations.annotation: as added June 10, 1998, D.C. Law 12-124, § 101(k), 45 DCR 2464
Applicability of § 101(k) of D.C. Law 12-124: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-609.51.
